Alexa, WTF Just Happened Today?

Get WTF Just Happened Today? for Alexa.

Enable Skill

 

WTF Alexa is a volunteer project by WTFJHT community member Jonathan Howard, a founder and growth consultant. The code is open source, and available on Github.

Just ask "Alexa, w-t-f just happened?"
